text: Belle is a brunette Disney princess. She is in the Disney movie, Beauty and the Beast. She is a normal girl who loves to read and help her father. She hates the Beast till she finds out he is not a beast. He has a loving heart and was cursed by an old woman. Some say Belle has brown eyes, others say she has hazel, but it really depends on the image. She has long brown hair, and a loving heart. Category:Disney characters Category:Animated movie characters
title: Belle (Disney)
